ygData.subject: Building with Visual Studio
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been working on building Cantera using MS Visual Studio 2005 from the most recent CVS source, and it appears that the vcproj files in CVS are out of date.

I've been working on building Cantera using MS Visual Studio 2005 from
the =
most recent CVS source, and it appears that the vcproj files in
CVS are out=
 of date. In addition to the issues with converting to the
new compiler ver=
sion (various spurious warnings), it seems like there
has been a reorganiza=
tion of the Cantera source files which required
quite a few changes to the =
project files. 

I was able to get the Cantera to compile cleanly (apparent=
ly) with my
modified project files, and I was wondering it would be useful =
for me
to provide these files, or whether there are other plans to update t=
he
provided Visual Studio project files.
